system.description: These creatures are thought to originally be from another world.
system.appearance: Cobbens look like humans with horse heads and horns.

overview.base:
You summon a @L[Property:Magic]{magical} item for the duration of this effect. The item is the same every time, but is unique to you. The @L[Category:Equipment]{type of item} is determined by the @L[Core:GM]{GM}. The item has @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F} number of @L[Category:Abilities]{abilities}. The @L[Core:GM]{GM} decides what these @L[Category:Abilities]{abilities} are based on your character's behavior, actions, and personal development. As you increase in @L[Core:Leveling Up]{LVL}, the item gets more and more detailed. The item uses 1 @L[Core:Presence]{presence tier}.

Upon summoning, the item appears in your hand (if you would hold it) and is instantly @L[Ability:Attune]{attuned} and equipped. You must be able to @L[Ability:Attune]{Attune} the item and be able to use it in order to summon it.

If the item is ever @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered}, you @L[Condition:Dead]{die}. If it is ever @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}, you @L[Condition:Dead]{die} and your body is @L[Condition:Ruined]{ruined}.
